Análisis..completers.vs..Intent.to.treat: Intention to treat (lo llaman imputed analysis)

instrument: 19 attitudinal items developed for the study
Grief.measure: 19 attitudinal items designed to assess content addressed in the intervention: perspectives on personal grief, personal styles of grieving, feelings of loss

other_stat: PLA + CGT was associated with significantly greater change in selfreport ratings than PLA alone (ICG adjusted mean difference = -8.01, p=0,0001) - suppl

Grief.measure:
Grief reactions were measured using 9 items that
were formulated on the basis of the criteria for complicated grief
proposed for DSM-V (Prigerson, Vanderwerker, & Maciejewski,
2008)
